questionTitle: It is ..................... that I'd like to go on a picnic.
He will not be .............. to vote in this year's election.
I would have met you at the bus terminal if I ............ that you ..............
My friend and I went to Susan's flat, and she introduced ............. to her mother.
Sometimes people injure ...................... when they handle sharp tools carelessly.
It is not very easy to study a foreign language all by ......................

anwers: How much does this book cost?

questionTitle: "Would you like some entertainment?" "I wouldn't mind having ......................"
